item.description: what a combo !  first we will have dinner at Effie's Place Family Restaurant located at 91 Park Rd West Hartford,Ct....quality food and service with affordable prices....they specialize in home cooked meals such as meatloaf,lasagna, and spagetti and meatballs.also a wide range of burgers and sandwiches....on a personal note....had breakfast today there...very good food and they do treat you like "family"..  The play....You're A Good Man Charlie Brown....based on the comic strip "Peanuts" by Charles Schulz...invites the kid in all of us into the world of Charlie Brown,his dog Snoopy,and the rest of the Peanuts gang for a fast-paced,lighthearted musical guaranteed to please audiences of all ages. This 1999 revised version won 2 Tony awards..come join in on the fun !........tickets are 29 dollars  (includes 1.50 service charge )...checks must be received to me no later than june 11....sent to chuck quint  125 ford road windsor ct 06095........any questions or problems my cell is 860-729-4504...let's have some fun....
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by Terri or Chuck cell 860-729-4504

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Dinner and Play June 18...5pm dinner...8pm Play. You're a Good Man Charlie Brown
